Title: The Final Countdown
Description: If you want to go from zero to hero in no time at all, you're gonna need an '80s-style montage with bombastic Big Hair anthems; endless synth lines, epic guitar solos, and absurdly inspirational lyrics. Da na na naaaaaaaaa!
Artists on this station: Rush, Bonnie Tyler, Kenny Loggins, Tears for Fears, Starship, Mr. Mister, Heart, John Cafferty, Huey Lewis, Queen, Guns N' Roses, Pat Benatar, Bruce Springsteen, Foreigner, Europe, John Parr,
